trans-unit.source: Used internally to support remote access to configuration data.
trans-unit.target: 在内部用于支持对配置数据的远程访问。

trans-unit.source: Base class from which <xref:System.Web.Configuration.RemoteWebConfigurationHostServer> extends.
trans-unit.target: 从其基类<xref:System.Web.Configuration.RemoteWebConfigurationHostServer>扩展。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.RemoteWebConfigurationHostServer>

trans-unit.source: Conditionally encrypts or decrypts the value of the string referenced by the xmlString parameter.
trans-unit.target: 有条件地加密或对引用的字符串值进行解密 xmlString 参数。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> to encrypt; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to decrypt.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>若要加密;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>进行解密。

trans-unit.source: The XML to be encrypted or decrypted.
trans-unit.target: 要加密或解密的 XML。

trans-unit.source: The provider used to protect the configuration data.
trans-unit.target: 用于保护的配置数据提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the protection provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>保护提供程序。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The keys of optional parameters for the protection provider.
trans-unit.target: 保护提供程序的可选参数的键。

trans-unit.source: The values of optional parameters for the protection provider.
trans-unit.target: 保护提供程序的可选参数的值。

trans-unit.source: A string containing either the encrypted or decrypted value of the xmlString.
trans-unit.target: 包含加密或解密值的字符串 xmlString 。

trans-unit.source: Used internally to support remote access to configuration data.
trans-unit.target: 在内部用于支持对配置数据的远程访问。

trans-unit.source: Path to the remote configuration file to be accessed.
trans-unit.target: 要访问的远程配置文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value specifying whether only the `readTime` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 布尔值，该值指定是否仅`readTime`返回。

trans-unit.source: Time the file was last accessed.
trans-unit.target: 上次访问文件的时间。

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_array" name="array" href=""></xref> of 8-bit unsigned integers (bytes) containing the configuration data.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_array" name="array" href=""> </xref>的 8 位无符号整数，（字节） 包含的配置数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets the details of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 获取配置文件的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The name of the file.
trans-unit.target: 文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the file exists; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该文件存在;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The size of the file.
trans-unit.target: 文件的大小。

trans-unit.source: The date the file was created.
trans-unit.target: 该文件的创建日期。

trans-unit.source: The date the file was last written.
trans-unit.target: 该文件的上次写入日期。

trans-unit.source: Used internally to support remote access to configuration data.
trans-unit.target: 在内部用于支持对配置数据的远程访问。

trans-unit.source: The level of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 配置文件的级别。

trans-unit.source: Path to the remote configuration file to be accessed.
trans-unit.target: 要访问的远程配置文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: Path to the remote machine.
trans-unit.target: 到远程计算机的路径。

trans-unit.source: The subpath of the location of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 配置文件的位置的子路径。

trans-unit.source: A concatenated string representing the file path of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 表示配置文件的文件路径的串联的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Used internally to support remote access to configuration data.
trans-unit.target: 在内部用于支持对配置数据的远程访问。

trans-unit.source: Path to the remote configuration file to be accessed.
trans-unit.target: 要访问的远程配置文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: File to duplicate file attributes from.
trans-unit.target: 要从其中复制文件属性文件。

trans-unit.source: Data to be written.
trans-unit.target: 要写入的数据。

trans-unit.source: Time the file was last accessed.
trans-unit.target: 上次访问文件的时间。
